Encoders Notes
I made a small avs script to crop & resize.
 I dropped that into vdubmod.
 There i lowered the brightness & saturation,
 increased the contrast & gamma.
 Then i de-noised it, changed the colors with a rgb eq,
 used a color de-noiser's & sharpened it.
 Finaly i re-encoded the audio & muxed it to the video.
 The a:r is off but i think it's better than the source.
 Its deffinatley watchable & better than most TS's.
 Download the sample first to check that your happy with the quality.
 Enjoy...


I am looking for:
 Cammers, Cams, Screeners (any type), Cam audio, Line audio, 
 Un-released R6's R5's R4's R2's R1's, 
 A Windows Server & a syncer. 
 If you can provide any of these please
